name: God Game (itch)
description:
Made by Toasteh and Keith Charles

Play as a god that gets its power from prayer and human sacrifice. Inspired by Black and White.

Try to keep the people alive as long as possible. You will be scored when they are all dead.

Controls:

Left Click: Pan camera

Right Click: Interact

Scroll Mouse Wheel: Zoom in and out

E and Q: Rotate Buildings

Escape: Cancel Building/Drop Item

Assign villager to a job by placing them near a job spot(wheat field or building scaffold)
